$
About
$
/$
$
/$
$
YOUR
#
1
SPOT FOR DINING
AND ENTERTAINMENT
/$
$
$
$
We are a family owned business who is passionate to provide a memorable dining experience "On The Edge" of The Fort Pierce Inlet.
​
We are driven to entertain your senses with bold flavors, refreshing beverages, enticing entertainment, carefilled service and breathtaking scenery on The Northern Edge of beautiful Hutchinson Island.
​
Let us be your first choice for dining, drink and waterfront entertainment.
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Discover our menu!
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
$
HAPPY
HOUR
/$
/$
$
/$
$
Happy Hour for Ladies
Thursdays all day Long!
​
We have your favorite drinks, excellent seafood, and the best local live music on the island!
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
$
LIVE MUSIC!
/$
/$
$
Come dance and listen to the best live music from all over florida!
​
Enjoy a unique dining experience with a breathtaking view of the Fort Pierce Inlet.
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
Contact
$
Bring your family, bring your friends, and even bring your pet.
Come for the food and stay for the fun !
/$
$
$
PLEASE CALL AHEAD FOR GROUPS OF 6 OR MORE
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
(772) 882-9729
/$
/$
$
/$
$
1136 Seaway Dr,Fort Pierce, Florida 34949
/$
$
$
/$
$
ontheedgebarandgrillfl@gmail.com
/$
/$
$
$

/$
/$
$
OPEN HOURS:
Monday - Thursday  11:30am to 9:00pm
Friday 11:30am to 11:00pm
Saturday 11:00am to 11:00pm
Sundays 11:00am to 9:00pm
